verses.verse: כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD שַׁ֜עַר <WH8179> The gate הֶחָצֵ֤ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִית֙ <WH6442> of the inner הַפֹּנֶ֣ה <WH6437> that looketh קָדִ֔ים <WH6921> toward the east יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become סָג֔וּר <WH5462> shall be shut שֵׁ֖שֶׁת <WH8337> the six יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> days הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH4639> working וּבְי֤וֹם <WH3117> and in the day הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> the sabbath יִפָּתֵ֔חַ <WH6605> it shall be opened וּבְי֥וֹם <WH3117> the day הַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the new moon יִפָּתֵֽחַ׃ <WH6605> it shall be opened

וּבָ֣א <WH935> shall enter הַנָּשִׂ֡יא <WH5387> And the prince דֶּרֶךְ֩ <WH1870> by the way אוּלָ֨ם <WH197> of the porch הַשַּׁ֜עַר <WH8179> of [that] gate מִח֗וּץ <WH2351> without וְעָמַד֙ <WH5975> and shall stand עַל־ <WH5921> by מְזוּזַ֣ת <WH4201> by the post הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> of the gate וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> shall prepare הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> and the priests אֶת־ <WH853> עֽוֹלָתוֹ֙ <WH5930> his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלָמָ֔יו <WH8002> and his peace offerings וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוָ֛ה <WH7812> and he shall worship עַל־ <WH5921> at מִפְתַּ֥ן <WH4670> at the threshold הַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> of the gate וְיָצָ֑א <WH3318> then he shall go forth וְהַשַּׁ֥עַר <WH8179> but the gate לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִסָּגֵ֖ר <WH5462> shall not be shut עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the evening

וְהִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <WH7812> shall worship עַם־ <WH5971> Likewise the people הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the land פֶּ֚תַח <WH6607> at the door הַשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of this gate הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he בַּשַּׁבָּת֖וֹת <WH7676> in the sabbaths וּבֶחֳדָשִׁ֑ים <WH2320> and in the new moons לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> And the burnt offering אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַקְרִ֥ב <WH7126> shall offer הַנָּשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> that the prince לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <WH7676> in the sabbath שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <WH8337> [shall be] six כְבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> lambs תְּמִימִ֖ם <WH8549> without blemish וְאַ֥יִל <WH352> and a ram תָּמִֽים׃ <WH8549> without blemish

וּמִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> And the meat offering אֵיפָ֣ה <WH374> [shall be] an ephah לָאַ֔יִל <WH352> for a ram וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֥ים <WH3532> for the lambs מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> and the meat offering מַתַּ֣ת <WH4991> to give יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> as he shall be able וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> of oil הִ֥ין <WH1969> and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <WH374> to an ephah

וּבְי֣וֹם <WH3117> And in the day הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the new moon פַּ֥ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> a young בָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> bull תְּמִימִ֑ם <WH8549> without blemish וְשֵׁ֧שֶׁת <WH8337> and six כְּבָשִׂ֛ם <WH3532> lambs וָאַ֖יִל <WH352> and a ram תְּמִימִ֥ם <WH8549> they shall be without blemish יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

וְאֵיפָ֨ה <WH374> an ephah לַפָּ֜ר <WH6499> for a bullock וְאֵיפָ֤ה <WH374> and an ephah לָאַ֙יִל֙ <WH352> for a ram יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> And he shall prepare מִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> a meat offering וְלַ֨כְּבָשִׂ֔ים <WH3532> and for the lambs כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after תַּשִּׂ֖יג <WH5381> shall attain יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> according as his hand וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> of oil הִ֥ין <WH1969> unto and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <WH374> to an ephah

וּבְב֖וֹא <WH935> shall enter הַנָּשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> And when the prince דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in by the way אוּלָ֤ם <WH197> of the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> of [that] gate יָב֔וֹא <WH935> he shall go וּבְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> by the way יֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> and he shall go forth

וּבְב֨וֹא <WH935> shall come עַם־ <WH5971> But when the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> of the land לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> the LORD בַּמּֽוֹעֲדִים֒ <WH4150> in the solemn feasts הַבָּ֡א <WH935> he that entereth דֶּרֶךְ־ <WH1870> in by the way שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> gate צָפ֜וֹן <WH6828> of the north לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֗ת <WH7812> to worship יֵצֵא֙ <WH3318> shall go out דֶּרֶךְ־ <WH1870> by the way שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate נֶ֔גֶב <WH5045> of the south וְהַבָּא֙ <WH935> and he that entereth דֶּרֶךְ־ <WH1870> by the way שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate נֶ֔גֶב <WH5045> of the south יֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> shall go forth דֶּרֶךְ־ <WH1870> by the way שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate צָפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> of the north לֹ֣א <WH3808> No יָשׁ֗וּב <WH7725> he shall not return דֶּ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> of the gate אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּ֣א <WH935> whereby he came in ב֔וֹ כִּ֥י <WH3588> over נִכְח֖וֹ <WH5226> over against [יֵצְאוּ כ] (יֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> shall go ק)

וְֽהַנָּשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> And the prince בְּתוֹכָ֤ם <WH8432> in the midst בְּבוֹאָם֙ <WH935> of them when they go in יָב֔וֹא <WH935> shall go in וּבְצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> and when they go forth יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <WH3318> shall go forth

וּבַחַגִּ֣ים <WH2282> And in the feasts וּבַמּוֹעֲדִ֗ים <WH4150> and in the solemnities תִּהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become הַמִּנְחָה֙ <WH4503> the meat offering אֵיפָ֤ה <WH374> shall be an ephah לַפָּר֙ <WH6499> to a bullock וְאֵיפָ֣ה <WH374> and an ephah לָאַ֔יִל <WH352> to a ram וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֖ים <WH3532> and to the lambs מַתַּ֣ת <WH4991> to give יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> as he is able וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> of oil הִ֥ין <WH1969> and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <WH374> to an ephah ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> When יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <WH6213> shall prepare הַנָּשִׂ֨יא <WH5387> Now when the prince נְדָבָ֜ה <WH5071> a voluntary עוֹלָ֣ה <WH5930> burnt offering אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or שְׁלָמִים֮ <WH8002> or peace offerings נְדָבָ֣ה <WH5071> voluntarily לַֽיהוָה֒ <WH3068> unto the LORD וּפָ֣תַֽח <WH6605> [one] shall then open ל֗וֹ אֶת <WH853> הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> him the gate הַפֹּנֶ֣ה <WH6437> that looketh קָדִ֔ים <WH6921> toward the east וְעָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> and he shall prepare אֶת־ <WH853> עֹֽלָתוֹ֙ <WH5930> his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלָמָ֔יו <WH8002> and his peace offerings כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> as he did בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וְיָצָ֛א <WH3318> then he shall go forth וְסָגַ֥ר <WH5462> [one] shall shut אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> the gate אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> and after צֵאתֽוֹ׃ <WH3318> his going forth

וְכֶ֨בֶשׂ <WH3532> [of] a lamb בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first שְׁנָת֜וֹ <WH8141> year תָּמִ֗ים <WH8549> without blemish תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> prepare עוֹלָ֛ה <WH5930> a burnt offering לַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> Thou shalt daily לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> it every בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> morning תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> thou shalt prepare אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וּמִנְחָה֩ <WH4503> a meat offering תַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> And thou shalt prepare עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> with בַּבֹּ֤קֶר <WH1242> for it every morning בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> morning שִׁשִּׁ֣ית <WH8345> the sixth part הָֽאֵיפָ֔ה <WH374> of an ephah וְשֶׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> of oil שְׁלִישִׁ֥ית <WH7992> and the third part הַהִ֖ין <WH1969> of an hin לָרֹ֣ס <WH7450> to temper with אֶת־ <WH853> הַסֹּ֑לֶת <WH5560> the fine flour מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> a meat offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD חֻקּ֥וֹת <WH2708> ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> by a perpetual תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> continually

[וַעָשׂוּ כ] (יַעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> accomplish ק) אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֧בֶשׂ <WH3532> the lamb וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֛ה <WH4503> and the meat offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> and the oil בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> every morning בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> morning עוֹלַ֖ת <WH5930> burnt offering תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> [for] a continual פ

כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> give הַנָּשִׂ֤יא <WH5387> If the prince מַתָּנָה֙ <WH4979> a gift לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto any מִבָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> of his sons נַחֲלָת֥וֹ <WH5159> the inheritance הִ֖יא <WH1931> he לְבָנָ֣יו <WH1121> thereof shall be his sons' תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> shall belong אֲחֻזָּתָ֥ם <WH272> it [shall be] their possession הִ֖יא <WH1931> he בְּנַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> by inheritance

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> if יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> But if he give מַתָּנָ֜ה <WH4979> a gift מִנַּחֲלָת֗וֹ <WH5159> of his inheritance לְאַחַד֙ <WH259> to one מֵֽעֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> of his servants וְהָ֤יְתָה <WH1961> shall belong לּוֹ֙ עַד־ <WH5704> shall be his until שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> then it shall be his to the year הַדְּר֔וֹר <WH1865> of liberty וְשָׁבַ֖ת <WH7725> after it shall return לַנָּשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> to the prince אַ֚ךְ <WH389> only נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> but his inheritance בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> shall be his sons' לָהֶ֥ם <WH1992> like תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> shall belong

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יִקַּ֨ח <WH3947> shall not take הַנָּשִׂ֜יא <WH5387> Moreover the prince מִנַּחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> inheritance הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> of the people's לְהֽוֹנֹתָם֙ <WH3238> by oppression מֵאֲחֻזָּתָ֔ם <WH272> them out of their possession מֵאֲחֻזָּת֖וֹ <WH272> out of his own possession יַנְחִ֣ל <WH5157> inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> [but] he shall give his sons לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> so אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָפֻ֣צוּ <WH6327> be not scattered עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> that my people אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man מֵאֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH272> from his possession

וַיְבִיאֵ֣נִי <WH935> After he brought בַמָּבוֹא֮ <WH3996> me through the entry אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> at עַל־ <WH5921> the side כֶּ֣תֶף <WH3802> which [was] at the side הַשַּׁעַר֒ <WH8179> of the gate אֶל־ <WH413> about הַלִּשְׁכ֤וֹת <WH3957> chambers הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> into the holy אֶל־ <WH413> for הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests הַפֹּנ֖וֹת <WH6437> which looked צָפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there מָק֔וֹם <WH4725> and behold there [was] a place [בַּיַּרְכֹתִם כ] (בַּיַּרְכָתַ֖יִם <WH3411> border ק) יָֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> westward ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> he unto me This [is] the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> where יְבַשְּׁלוּ־ <WH1310> shall boil שָׁם֙ <WH8033> in it הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> where the priests אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> the trespass offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> and the sin offering אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> where יֹאפוּ֙ <WH644> where they shall bake אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> the meat offering לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> may not הוֹצִ֛יא <WH3318> that they bear אֶל־ <WH413> about הֶחָצֵ֥ר <WH2691> court הַחִֽיצוֹנָ֖ה <WH2435> [them] not out into the utter לְקַדֵּ֥שׁ <WH6942> to sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֗נִי <WH3318> Then he brought me forth אֶל־ <WH413> about הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> court הַחִ֣יצֹנָ֔ה <WH2435> into the utter וַיַּ֣עֲבִירֵ֔נִי <WH5674> and caused me to pass by אֶל־ <WH413> to אַרְבַּ֖עַת <WH702> the four מִקְצוֹעֵ֣י <WH4740> corners הֶחָצֵ֑ר <WH2691> of the court וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold חָצֵר֙ <WH2691> [there was] a court בְּמִקְצֹ֣עַ <WH4740> and behold in every הֶחָצֵ֔ר <WH2691> a court חָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> of the court בְּמִקְצֹ֥עַ <WH4740> corner הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> of the court

בְּאַרְבַּ֜עַת <WH702> In the four מִקְצֹע֤וֹת <WH4740> corners הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> of the court חֲצֵר֣וֹת <WH2691> [there were] courts קְטֻר֔וֹת <WH7000> joined אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> of forty אֹ֔רֶךְ <WH753> [cubits] long וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> and thirty רֹ֑חַב <WH7341> broad מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> measure אַחַ֔ת <WH259> [were] of one לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֖ם <WH702> these four מְׅהֻׅקְׅצָׅעֽׅוֹׅתׅ׃ <WH7106> corners

וְט֨וּר <WH2905> And [there was] a row סָבִ֥יב <WH5439> [of building] round about בָּהֶ֛ם סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> in them round about לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ם <WH702> them four וּמְבַשְּׁל֣וֹת <WH4018> with boiling places עָשׂ֔וּי <WH6213> and [it was] made מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַטִּיר֖וֹת <WH2918> under the rows סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> he unto me These [are] the places הַֽמְבַשְּׁלִ֔ים <WH1310> of them that boil אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after יְבַשְּׁלוּ־ <WH1310> shall boil שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it מְשָׁרְתֵ֥י <WH8334> where the ministers הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> the sacrifice הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people
